GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1984 as Institute of American Business - MBA University. Acquired present status and title 2000.
Founded 1957 as Academy of Arts, acquired present status and title 1973.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Uverenje o Završenoj Srednjoj Školi) or recognized equivalent, and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1808 as School, became Lyceum 1838, and College with Faculties of Philosophy, Law, and Technology 1863. Acquired present status and title 1905.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Uverenje o Završenoj Srednjoj Školi) and entrance examination
Secondary school certificate (Uverenje o Završenoj Srednjoj Školi) or recognized equivalent, and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1965, incorporating faculties formerly attached to the University of Belgrade.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate or equivalent and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1960 with Faculties of Agriculture and Philosophy (established 1954/55 as faculties of the University of Belgrade).
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate, and entrance examination
Secondary school certificate or equivalent, and entrance examination
